activities: We collect video footage from retail stores and restaurants.  We analyze the video to help the stores and restaurants improve operational efficiency, safety and customer service.  The results of our analysis are abstracted away from the individual, and we only report on shoppers in the aggregate.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: video images of people in a store
privacyprograms: Better Business Bureau EU Safe Harbor
recoursemech: Better Business Bureau EU Safe Harbor
